quest.name: A Feeling in the Belly
journal:
 Quest Sync
The worried waif looks around in desperation.
objectives: Use the copper knife on the trees northwest of Gatetown to gather strips of dried bark.
Deliver the strips of dried bark to the puissant potion-maker.
Deliver the pouch of herbal pellets to the worried waif.

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: Please, won't anybody help us...?

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: It's my brother─his belly hurts so much, he can't even move. I don't think the “fresh water” we bought was fresh at all...

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: Could you talk to the potion-maker for us, missmister? I already tried, but when he started explaining the things he wanted for the medicine, I... I got scared and ran away.

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: The potion-maker needed something to make the medicine, but I've already forgotten what he said...

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: Welcome, welcome! What concoctions are you after today, then?

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: ...Ah, yes, I remember─the young girl and her ailing brother.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: I'd used the last of my bark, you see, and all I wanted was for her to gather some from the trees on the cape. The way she ran off, you'd think I'd asked for a bowl of her blood or something...

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: You're welcome to collect a few strips in her stead if you like... Although I don't expect you'd want the bother.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: ...Still here? Very well, then. Find some trees, and use this knife to very carefully peel away three pieces of nice, dry bark. I won't hold my breath.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: All I need is three or so nicely dried strips of bark. Make sure you use that copper knife. Very important. Oh, and do bring the knife back, if you please?

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: Ah, I see you finally came to your senses. Let's have that knife back, then...

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: ...What's this?

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: You actually went to harvest the bark!? But...what could you possibly hope to gain? Kindness will get you nowhere in this rotten town!

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text:
<sigh> What a rare soul you must be...
I suppose I have no choice now but to mix up the cure I promised.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: I've mixed some herbs and powders together with the bark you brought─a few pellets a day should soon settle the aches in the lad's stomach.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: Never mind the payment. After all, it's you who's done most of the legwork.

dialogue.name: PHARMACIST03354
dialogue.text: You know, I'd hoped to trade my healing skills for a life in Eulmore, but...maybe my place is here, amongst the poor and the desperate. To help for the sake of helping, to be needed. Aye, it's not a bad feeling...

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: Did you go and see the potion-maker...?

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: ...For my brother!? Oh, thank you, missmister! You've saved his life!

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: You'll be wanting coin, right? Uh, I'm not sure we─

dialogue.name: POORGIRKL03354
dialogue.text: ...What do you mean, “nothing”? Here, you must take these at least─I collected them myself! Thank you again!
